| History                 = 
The Providian Order is a top secret organization, created to bring equality and uniformity to the universe, by creating a new perfect race. To most of the cosmos it is known only by rumor and considered by some to be a myth. It is led by a "Collective" of which [[Sharada Darthri (Earth-616)|Sharada Darthri]] is a member and the organization has members from various species.

To achieve their goal, Sharada experimented on various races, combining their genetic lines. At some point after the death of [[Gabriel Summers (Earth-616)|Emperor Vulcan]] his [[Cal'syee Neramani (Earth-616)|wife]] was captured by the Order. However they weren't really interested in Deathbird herself, but only in her child - a hybrid of atavistic [[Shi'ar]] and powerful [[Homo superior|Mutant]]. [[Sharada Darthri (Earth-616)|Sharada Darthri]] experimented on the baby and infused it with [[Kree]] geneline.{{r|X-Men Vol 4 #18|20}}
